summary:
Adds 7 New spells to the game:
Pandora\'s Box
Force Throw
Ice Block
Conjure Bear
Conjure Saber Cat
Conjure Mammoth
Conjure Mudcrab
Conjure Frost Troll
Some of these spells are a little overpowered. They can be purchased from Magic Vendors in Skyrim such as Farengar Secret Fire in Dragonsreach, Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Steam Workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=18066
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vC-M4enyJn8&list=UUdOmK3MTb8CFL3NkmE6n1Pg&index=1&feature=plcp
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Adds 7 New spells to the game:

Pandora\'s Box: This spell has an unpredictable effect! You could turn an enemy into a sweetroll or a Dremora! Who knows what can happen next? (Basically this is just a Wabbajack spell)

Force Throw: Unleash a frosty force push onto your enemies and blast them away!

Ice Block: Cast a storm of ice that freezes opponents solid.

Conjure Bear: Conjures an ethereal/ghost-like bear that will fight for you.

Conjure Saber Cat: Conjures an ethereal/ghost-like Saber Cat that will fight for you.

Conjure Mammoth: Conjures an ethereal/ghost-like Mammoth that will fight for you.

Conjure Mudcrab: Conjures an ethereal/ghost-like Mudcrab that will fight for you. If you want the Mudcrab to have a top hat and monocle, download the \"Posh Mudcrabs\" mod on Steam Workshop.

Conjure Frost Troll: Conjures an ethereal/ghost-like Troll that will fight for you.

Some of these spells are a little overpowered. They can be purchased from Magic Vendors in Skyrim such as Farengar Secret Fire in Dragonsreach, Whiterun.
author: ClayVn

files.name: Updated Version of Magic Pack - More Spells
